‪Date Available: NOW‬
‪Bedroom: Studio
‪Bathrooms: Communal Space Shared Bathrooms‬
‪Pet Policy: Cats and Dogs allowed with additional deposit and pet rent
‪This is a Charming Remodeled Studio in the heart of Downtown LA.
Across the street from LA Film Center Studios.
This is an Artsy Community Building with an onsite Cleaning Lady!.
With these unique Artsy Studios the bathroom is located in the building like a Dorm style Setting but with a Cleaning person that details the building everyday.
All Utilities Are Included as well.‬
‪This building is located 3 Blocks from 24 Hour Fitness, Target, Metro Rail, and tons of Restaurants.
Starbucks and grocery stores are walking distance as well.
This cozy remodeled single features: new floors, built in closet space, large new kitchen countertop, lots of cabinets, and a mini fridge that is available upon request.
There is laundry onsite, a professional manager, and walking distance to shopping, restaurants, freeways and many bus lines.
‪This building is PET FRIENDLY
‪Pet deposit is $300.00
‪Pet rent: $35.00 per month
463 S Bixel St, Los Angeles, CA 90017‬
